DOC.brief_summary: A study obtain safety tolerability data
DOC.brief_title: Major Depressive Disorder Study In Adults
DOC.criteria: Patient must primary diagnosis Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) . Discontinued selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) serotoninnorepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRI ) regimen due intolerability . Minimum time frame last dose previous antidepressant initiation study drug one week . Maximum time frame last dose prior antidepressant initiation study drug 2 month . Patient previously treat study drug . Is experience adverse event attribute previous SSRI/SNRI use resolve least one week prior Baseline Visit . Has history seizure disorder . Has meet criterion substance abuse dependence within 6 month prior Baseline Visit . Currently use antidepressant . Currently pregnant .
